pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bun is an incredibly fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, transpiler and package manager - all in one. It is designed as a drop-in replacement for Node.js with native support for TypeScript, JSX, and modern JavaScript features. Bun includes a fast npm-compatible package manager, a test runner, and a bundler, making it an all-in-one toolkit for JavaScript development.
